#include <iostream>
#define ull unsigned long long
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		ull s,e;
		cin>>s>>e;
		int n;
		int yes=1;
		cin>>n;
		while(n--) {
			ull x,y;
			cin>>x>>y;
			if(!(y<=s||x>=e))
				yes=0;
		}
		if(yes)
			cout<<"YES\n";
		else
			cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
